attributes.action: SCRAP BREXIT OR AT LEAST A FAIR REFERENDUM
attributes.additional_details:
please can we all sign this both retainers and leavers as the last referendum was totally unjust and unfair
and please everybody share this as far and wide as possible
attributes.background: this is my first petition so.........please help me ....we need the government to know that we don't want to leave the EU or at least let's have a fair referendum now that everybody knows the facts and information about the effects...I'm absolutely fed up to the teeth with this

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might find that there's already a petition open that you agree with and would like to sign. You can search and sign petitions here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open
